Posts.Content: Just a booster, haven't had one in years.
Posts.Title: Radiation and tetanus shot?

Posts.Content: I finished radiation treatments at the end of Jan. My primary care dr wants me to have a tetanus shot but was not sure if I can have one after radiation. Does anyone know?
Posts.Title: Radiation and tetanus shot?

Posts.Content: Yes, it is normal. If anything has changed in 6 months, they will do an ultrasound.
Posts.Title: why would you redo a mammogram in 3 to six months
